entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near midnight and ending overnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls after midnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 27 in the afternoon.
